messages.subject: Re: [SPAM] [samuraihistory] NEED HELP
messages.msgSnippet: ... Lindsey, feel free to drop me a line anytime. I ll be glad to help. Tony
messages.messageBody:
On Jan 28, 2007, at 7:50 PM, The Gilberts :-) wrote:

> Hi,
>
> My name is Lindsey and I am in eighth grade. I have been assigned a
> project in school on Samurai and as part of my assignment I must
> *interview* an "expert" on the subject. This is my second request
> for help, but I am afraid maybe I didn't explain very well the
> first time. I must also do research as part of my assignment, but I
> really need to *interview* someone. I only have about 10 questions.
> Is there anyone on this list who might be able to help me?
>
Lindsey, feel free to drop me a line anytime. I'll be glad to help.


Tony

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] NEED HELP
messages.msgSnippet: Lindsey-- The problem is, most of us here are enthusiasts, but hesitate to call ourselves experts . Feel free to send me your questions and I will try to
messages.messageBody:
Lindsey--

The problem is, most of us here are enthusiasts, but
hesitate to call ourselves "experts". Feel free to
send me your questions and I will try to help, but my
help may be pointing you towards someone else who is
more qualified.

Nate

messages.subject: Re: [SPAM] [samuraihistory] NEED HELP
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, My name is Lindsey and I am in eighth grade. I have been assigned a project in school on Samurai and as part of my assignment I must *interview* an
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

My name is Lindsey and I am in eighth grade. I have been assigned a project in school on Samurai and as part of my assignment I must *interview* an "expert" on the subject. This is my second request for help, but I am afraid maybe I didn't explain very well the first time. I must also do research as part of my assignment, but I really need to *interview* someone. I only have about 10 questions. Is there anyone on this list who might be able to help me?

Thanks!
----- Original Message -----
From: Craig
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2007 9:37 PM
Subject: [SPAM] [samuraihistory] NEED HELP


I need some information on how the samurai did the swordmanship
training. I have been looking all over the web, but i can't find what
I'm looking for. Please help~





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
